Class PostgreSql

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.postgresql.databases.PostgreSql
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database<PostgreSqlJdbc,PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>, DefaultDatabase<PostgreSqlJdbc,PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
public class PostgreSql extends Object implements DefaultDatabase<PostgreSqlJdbc,PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
Represents a PostgreSQL database.

    • hasSchemas

      public boolean hasSchemas()
      Description copied from interface: Database
      Indicates if this type supports schemas.

      When schemas are supported the methods Database.createSchema(String) and Database.schemaExists() needs to be implemented.

      Specified by:
      hasSchemas in interface Database<PostgreSqlJdbc,PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
      Returns:
